Adolfo, 51 years old, lives with his life partner and has 3 children. Ever since he was 10 years old, he has worked in agriculture, just as his father taught him and his brothers to do. They had to work a great deal as they were a large family. Today, he works alongside his own eldest son so that they can provide for the family.
He buys his supplies in a place close to his home, and then has to pay for a motor taxi to bring the supplies back to his home. He is applying for a loan to buy 2 small bovine calves to fatten up and sell on. He hopes that this will improve his earnings for his family and he will be able to buy more grazing livestock, allowing him to continue to improve his income.

loans.use: to buy 2 small calves to fatten up and sell on.

loans.name: Mauricio Ebigail

texts.es:
El señor Mauricio tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y tiene dos hijos, uno de 5 años y otro de 3 años de edad. Él es un agricultor, jornalero que aprendió estas actividades de sus padres, desde hace 15 años. Su esposa se dedica a elaborar chocolate desde hace tres años, hace cinco libras dos veces a la semana y las vende a $15 dólares cada una.

Los materiales los compra en una ciudad que esta a unos quince kilómetros de distancia de donde vive. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando Mauricio es para comprar materiales para construcción de una cocina, como 15 metros de lamina, 5 polines, medio quintal de hierro, 2 bolsas de cemento y pago de mano de obra. Con la inversión que realizara podrá construir la cocina que tanto necesita, para tener los alimentos en mejores condiciones, ya que por el momento la cocina la tiene a campo libre. 

En el futuro desea tener una casa con tres habitaciones, por que sus hijos van creciendo y necesitan tener privacidad.
texts.en:
Mauricio is 37 years old and lives with his life partner.  He has two children, one is 5 and the other is 3.  Mauricio is an agricultural worker who learned this work from his father 15 years ago.  His wife has been making chocolate for years.  She makes 5lbs twice a week and sells them for $15 each.  She buys her materials in a city which is 15km from their home.

Mauricio is requesting a loan to buy materials for building a kitchen.  He will buy 15 meters of corrugated metal, 5 pieces of lumber, 50lbs of iron and 2 bags of cement.  He will also pay workmen.  This investment will enable him to build the kitchen that he so needs so that he can keep his food in better conditions because, right now, his kitchen is in the open air.

In the future, Mauricio would like to have a house with three bedrooms because his children are growing and need privacy.

loans.use: to buy materials for building a kitchen (15 meters of corrugated metal, 5 pieces of lumber, 50lbs of iron and two bags of cement) and to pay workmen

loans.name: Quince Mas Uno Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Quince más Uno” está conformado por 18 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran artesania de ropa, amasanderia, pasteleria, artesanía de juegos didacticos, confeccion, peluqueria, venta de huevos, entre otros.
Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de Independencia, ciudad de Santiago. 
Mónica integrante del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en la segunda fila del grupo, está de pié y ocupa el primer lugar de derecha a izquierda. Usa unas gafas para el sol, viste una polera manga corta color negro y su cabello es de color castaño claro, además lo usa tomado.
Ella se dedica a bordar ropa, desde hace 2 años. Su trabajo lo denomina “bordado con sentimiento”, ya que escribe poemas, nombres, dedicatorias en diferentes prendas, según lo requiera cada cliente. Algunos de estos productos son mantas y poleras. Además ha incorporado de manera estable el trabajo en la hechura de logos corporativos para algunas empresas, comenta que durante los meses de enero y febrero trabajó para una productora en la hechura de mantas.
Trabajos que han sido un importante aporte económico para su familia.
Sus materiales los compra en las comunas de Independencia y Estación Central. 
Con el crédito comprará poleras, mantas, hilos, papel fusionado y toallas para bordar. Además del pago en la mantención de la maquina bordadora que utiliza.
Una de sus metas a corto plazo, es comprar una maquina bordadora computarizada, para expandir su negocio, ya que actualmente utiliza las maquinarias de su madre. De ésta manera también podría independizarse.
Mónica vive junto a sus dos hijos de 18 y 13 años de edad. Su hija mayor entrará a estudiar a un pre universitario, para prepararse de buena manera y rendir la prueba de selección universitaria (PSU) de ésta manera estudiar la carrera de odontología en la Universidad. 
Las motivaciones de Mónica son esforzarse cada día, para generar mayores ingresos, de esta manera podría concretar sus sueños.
Ella se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida del crédito entregado por Fondo esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio y superarse económicamente. Comenta que el grupo del Banco comunal al cual participa está muy afiatado por lo que se siente muy cómoda. 
Independencia es una de las 34 comunas que componen la ciudad de Santiago (capital de Chile), ubicada en el sector centro-norte. Surgió a fines del siglo XIX como un sector tradicional de la ciudad. Su eje principal es la Av. Independencia, por la cual pasaba el antiguo Camino del Inca, puerta de entrada por el norte, a la ciudad de Santiago. Dada su amplia población indígena, en Independencia se encuentra el Centro Cultural Indígena de Chile. Cuenta también con importantes construcciones históricas, entre ellas 6 monumentos históricos de Chile.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Quince más Uno" [Fifteen plus One] and is made up of 18 members, who make a living in different sectors, among which are clothes crafts, bakery, confectionery, educational games crafts, sewing, hairdressing, and selling eggs. All the members belong to the commune of Independencia, in the city of Santiago.

Mónica is part of this communal bank. She is on the second row of the photo, standing up in first position on the right hand side. She is wearing sunglasses, a short-sleeved black T-shirt and her hair is light brown and tied back. She has been making a living sewing clothes for the last two years. She calls her work "bordado con sentimiento" [embroidered with feeling], as she writes poems, names or dedications on different articles of clothing, depending on the desires of each customer. Some of her products are blankets and T-shirts. Also, she has introduced making logos for some businesses as a stable source of work. She comments that during the months of January and February she worked for a manufacturer in making blankets.

Her work has been an important economical support for her family. She buys her materials in the communes of Independencia and Estación Central.

With this loan she will buy T-shirts, blankets, threads, blended paper and towels to embroider. Also, she will pay the maintenance of the sewing machine she uses.

One of her short term goals is to buy a computerized sewing machine, to extend her business, as at the moment she uses her mother's machines. In this way, she will also be able to become independent.

Mónica lives with her two children aged 18 and 13. Her oldest daughter will start studying a pre-university course to prepare herself well and take the PSU (prueba de selección unversitaria [university selection test]) in order to study a dentistry degree at university.

Mónica's motivations are to make an effort every day, to generate a higher income and in this way fulfil her dreams.

She is very happy and grateful for the loan provided by Fondo Esperanza, as it has allowed her to invest in her business and to succeed economically. She comments that the communal bank group she participates in is very close and and feels very comfortable.

Independencia is one of the 34 communes that make up the city of Santiago (the capital city of Chile), located in the central-north sector. It arose at the end of the 19th century as a traditional part of the city. Its main axis is Independencia Avenue which used to be the ancient Road of the Inca which was the northern gate of the city of Santiago. Because of its extensive indigenous population the Chilean Indigenous Cultural Center is found in Independencia. It also has important historical buildings among which are six historical Chilean monuments.

loans.use: to buy T-shirts, blankets, threads, blended paper and towels to embroider. Also, she will pay the maintenance of the sewing machine she uses.

loans.name: Ángel María

texts.es:
la señora Angel tiene 66 años de edad, es viuda y tiene tres hijos. Desde que tiene 10 años de edad ella se ha dedicado a la agricultura, ya que su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y por no tener el suficiente dinero para contratar a empleados, él llevaba a toda la familia a trabajar, ya que era necesario. Por esa razón ella aprendió muy bien y desde que quedo viuda, realza esas actividades junto con sus nietos en 21,000 metros cuadrados de terreno en donde siembra maíz.

Los insumos los compra en un lugar más cercano a su vivienda, luego tiene que pagar una mototaxi, para trasladarlos hacia su casa, después paga a una persona que los lleve en carreta hasta el lugar donde los utilizara.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar dos bueyes, para trasladar los insumos agrícolas y no tener que pagar este servicio disminuyendo los costos, para mejorar el rendimiento, disponibilidad agrícola y la situación económica de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
Angel, 66 years old, is a widow with 3 children. Ever since she was 10 years old, she has worked in agriculture. Her father worked in the same industry and, as he didn't have enough money to employee any helpers, he used to take the whole family to work with him as a necessity. Consequently, she learned a great deal and, since she became a widow, she has been carrying out this work alongside her grandchildren in 21,000 square metres of land where they sow corn seeds.
She buys her supplies in a place close to her home, and then has to pay a motor taxi to bring them back to her home. Later, she also has to pay someone to bring them in a cart to the place where they will be used.
She is applying for a loan to buy 2 oxen to transport her farming supplies so that she doesn't have to pay for this cart service. She hopes this will decrease her costs and increase her earnings, her farming resources and improve her own and her family's economic situation.

loans.use: to buy 2 oxen and to transport farming supplies.

loans.name: Luz Estela

texts.es:
Luz Estela es una persona que le ha tocado trabajar fuertemente durante gran parte de su vida para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Madre de 4 hijos a los cuales su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo sin contribuir con un aporte económico, Luz Estela debe garantizar los ingresos de toda su familia para poder salir adelante y continuar con una calidad de vida digna. Luz Estela anteriormente trabajaba para la empresa de aseo de la ciudad barriendo las calles, pero un deterioro de su salud hizo que tuviera que abandonar este trabajo y dedicarse a una actividad diferente. Es por esto que Luz Estela montó su negocio desde hace aproximadamente 4 años, donde vende principalmente prendas de vestir, y gracias a este puede generar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Con el ánimo de responder a un pedido que le ha hecho un cliente, Luz Estela aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir para responder a un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente suyo.

Luz Estela espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente pues podrá seguir atendiendo sus clientes y aumentar su capital. Además, Luz Estela sueña con que su negocio crezca y se consolide, de modo que sus ingresos aumenten y les pueda ofrecer a sus 4 hijos la mejor educación posible y una estabilidad económica que les permita evitar pasar por tantas adversidades como ha pasado ella.
texts.en:
Luz Estela is a person who has had to work hard during a large part of her life in order to provide for her family.  She is the mother of four children whose father left them some time ago without providing any financial support.  Luz Estela must guarantee the income for her whole family in order to make progress and continue enjoying a decent quality of life.  She used to work for a cleaning company in the city, sweeping streets, but a decline in her health meant that she had to leave that job and start doing something else.  For this reason, she set up her own business approximately four years ago.  She mainly sells clothing and, thanks to this, she is able to make enough income to support her household.  With the goal of responding to an order that she has received from a customer, Luz Estela would like to take out a loan.  This will give her the opportunity to buy the clothing she needs to respond to this big order.  

Luz Estela hopes that her income will increase considerably so that she can continue serving her customers and increase her capital.  She dreams of her business growing and strengthening so that her income increases and she is able to offer her four children the best education possible and financial stability which will allow them to avoid experiencing as many hardships as she did.

loans.use: to buy clothing to respond to a large order that she has from one of her customers

loans.name: José Florencio

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 31 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijas, una de 8 años que comenzara el tercer grado y otra de 5 años que comenzara a ir a la escuela. Viven en un mismo espacio familiar su mamá, su hermana y ellos, pero cada quien en su casa. Él vive en casa propia con su familia, no tienen energía eléctrica ni agua potable y quieren reparar la casa, él es comerciante y se dedica todos los días a la venta de frutas y verduras.

Empezó a trabajar desde aproximadamente 5 años, comenta que se aventuro a trabajar propio después de una serie de experiencias en otros trabajos hasta que se decidió con la venta de frutas y verduras. Toda esa experiencia le sirvió para aventurarse en el mundo del negocio, para saber regatear, saber administrar y economizar, además de conocer el mercado, su mejor época y las mejores rutas de venta, además de identificar clientes potenciales.

Se levanta todos los días a las 4:00 a.m. de la mañana, para trasladarse al mercado municipal en su automóvil y realizar las compras, luego se va a vender hasta las 6:30 p.m. y la mercadería que le sobra es para el siguiente día.

Él préstamo que esta solicitando es para realizarle mejoras a su casa, instalar la energía eléctrica, agua potable e invertir en el negocio. Con esa inversión podrá contar con los servicios básicos en su vivienda y podrá terminar el área de una parte de la casa, con esto mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia. José piensa seguir mejorando la casa, por que piensa en sus hijos y les gustaría brindarles comodidad y mantener su negocio para sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is 31 years old, married, and has two daughters.  His eldest is 8 years old and about to start third grade and his youngest is 5 years old and about to start school.  His mom, his sister and his family share the same family space but each lives in their own house.  José lives in his own home together with his family.  They do not have electricity or drinking water and would like to make some repairs to the house.  José is a salesman and his daily business is selling fruit and vegetables.

José started working approximately five years ago.  He says that he started working for himself after gaining experience in other jobs that he did.  He decided to sell fruit and vegetables.  All his experience served him well as he ventured into the world of business, as he knew how to haggle, run a business and save money.  In addition, he knew the market, the best time of year, the best sales routes, and was able to identify potential customers.

José gets up every day at 4.00am to travel to the town market in his vehicle and make his purchases.  He then sells his products until 6.30pm and keeps the merchandise he has left for the following day.

The loan that José is requesting will be used to make improvements to his home, install electricity and drinking water, and invest in his business.  With this investment, he will be able to enjoy basic services and finish building part of his home.  This will improve his family's quality of life.  José plans to continue improving his home because he is thinking of his children and would like to provide them with some comfort.  He would also like to keep his business running so that he can provide for his children.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home, install electricity and drinking water, and invest in his business

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que ha tenido que enfrentar muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo su fortaleza y el acompañamiento de su familia le han permitido salir adelante y superar estos obstáculos. Maria es una mujer casada y es madre de 4 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar lo mejor posible, es por esto que siempre trabaja fuertemente en su tienda con el ánimo de generar ingresos suficientes para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Debido a que su esposo tiene un sueldo muy bajo que no alcanza para cubrir todas las necesidades de su familia, Maria decidió montar una tienda en la cual pudiera ofrecer todos los productos de la canasta familiar. Así, hace aproximadamente 7 años, comenzó a montar su tienda y pudo tener muy buenas ventas durante un tiempo, pero debido a conflictos de violencia que existían en ese tiempo en su sector, debió cerrar su tienda por un gran tiempo. Hace poco tiempo Maria volvió a abrir su tienda y poco a poco ha ido surtiéndola de los productos de la canasta familia. Con el ánimo de seguir surtiendo su tienda y poder tener una tienda que cumpla todas las necesidades de sus clientes, Maria busca un préstamo que le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familia para seguir surtiendo su tienda.

Maria espera poder cumplir su sueño de tener una gran tienda y poder seguir aportando a su hogar ingresos con los que se puedan cubrir las necesidades de su esposo y sus 4 hijos. Además, Maria sueña con que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y con que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who has had to face much adversity in her life. However, her resilience and the support of her family have allowed her to get ahead and overcome these obstacles. Maria is a married woman and the mother of four children, to whom she has always wished to provide the best possible. Thus she always works hard in her store in hopes of generating sufficient income to cover her household's expenses. 

Since her husband's salary is very low and doesn't cover all the family's needs, Maria decided to open a store where she could offer all the basic household staples. And so, approximately seven years ago, she began setting up her store and achieved very good sales for a time. However, owing to violent conflicts which existed at that time in her region, she had to close her store for a long time. Just recently Maria reopened her store and little by little has been stocking it with household products. In hopes of continuing to stock her store and being able to have a store which fulfills all of her customers' needs, Maria seeks a loan which allows her the possibility of accessing the purchase of household products in order to keep stocking her shelves. 

Maria hopes to fulfill her dream of having a large store and of continuing to supply income to her home with which to cover the needs of her husband and her four children. Furthermore, Maria dreams that her family would have a better quality of life and that her children would have access to a quality education.

loans.use: to purchase basic household staples with which to stock her store.

loans.name: Bercelly Del Socorro

texts.es:
Bercelly es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos, pues su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo, por lo que Bercelly les debe garantizar el sostenimiento de todos sus gastos y garantizarles una buena calidad de vida. Bercelly anteriormente recibía un apoyo económico del padre de sus hijos, pero de un tiempo para acá este apoyo no lo volvió a recibir. Es por esto que ahora Bercelly quiere montar una venta de legumbres con el ánimo de poder generar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Bercelly quiere adecuar en una parte de su vivienda la legumbrería, para poder estar así al pendiente de sus hijos. Debido a que Bercelly no cuenta con el capital suficiente para el montaje de su venta de legumbres, aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de legumbres y una estantería para montar su venta de legumbres.

Bercelly espera que de esta manera pueda garantizar sus ingresos y pueda mejorar su condición de vida actual, a la vez que poder ofrecerles a sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progresar. Bercelly sueña con que sus hijos accedan a una educación de calidad y puedan ser grandes profesionales y reconocidos por su calidad humana.
texts.en:
Bercelly is a single mother who heads her family of two children as their father left them some time ago.  This means that Bercelly must support her children in all their expenses and guarantee them a good quality of life.  Bercelly previously received financial support from her children's father but some time ago she stopped receiving this support.  For this reason, she would now like to set up a business selling vegetables with the aim of making enough income to support her household.  She would like to equip part of her home for her vegetable store so that she can be there for her children.  As she doesn't have enough capital to set up her business, she hopes to receive a loan which will give her the opportunity to buy vegetables and some shelving in order to start out. 

Bercelly hopes that she will be able to guarantee her income and improve her current living conditions.  She would also like to be able to offer her two children a better quality of life and better opportunities to make progress.  She dreams of her children having a good-quality education and becoming professionals who are known for their humanity.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and a shelving unit

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre se ha caracterizado por querer brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso. Luzmila se encuentra casada y es madre de 4 hijos, además, tuvo una hija que murió cuando ya tenía un hijo, lo que hizo que Luzmila se convirtiera en abuela y ahora también le garantiza a su nieto su sustento. Luzmila vende junto con su esposo comidas como arepas de chócolo, empanadas, pasteles, gelatina, entre otros, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Luzmila vende sus productos todos los días a domicilio en su barrio o en barrios cercanos a su vivienda, además, los fines de semana se ubican a las afueras de una cárcel y les vende la comida a las personas que hacen la fila para el ingreso. Luzmila en la actualidad tiene muy buenas ventas y gracias a esto ha podido garantizar el estudio universitario de 2 de sus hijos. Con el ánimo de seguir ejerciendo su actividad, Luzmila busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos y materiales para sus comidas como son recipientes, ollas, canastillas, e implementos de cocina que requiere renovar.

Luzmila espera seguir ejerciendo su actividad y que su negocio de comidas siga creciendo hasta el punto de lograr ubicarse en un local donde pueda atender a los clientes que la visitan. Además, Luzmila sueña con que todos sus hijos puedan acceder a una buena educación y poderles garantizar una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luzmila is a very hard-working person who has always been noted for wanting to provide her children with a better quality of life and better opportunities for making progress.  Luzmila is married and the mother of four children.  She also had a daughter who died when she already had a son of her own which made Luzmila a grandmother.  She now also supports her grandson.

Luzmila and her husband sell food such as 'arepas de choclo' (Colombian corn cakes with cheese), empanadas, pies, gelatin desserts, etc.  Thanks to this, she makes the income she needs to support her household.  Luzmila sells her products every day.  She provides home delivery in her neighborhood or in nearby neighborhoods.  On weekends, she and her husband also set up outside a prison and sell food to people lining up to go in.  Luzmila currently makes very good sales and, thanks to this, she has been able to guarantee the university education of two of her children.  With the goal of continuing to carry out her business, Luzmila is looking for a loan which will enable her to buy supplies and materials that she needs for making her food such as containers, pans, small baskets and cooking utensils that she needs to replace.

Luzmila hopes to continue working in her business and hopes that it continues to grow until she is able to set up in premises where she can serve customers who visit her.  Luzmila also dreams of all her children enjoying a good education and being able to guarantee them a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies and materials for making her food such as containers, pans, small baskets and cooking utensils that she needs to replace

loans.name: Lucero Del Socorro

texts.es:
Lucero es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer brindar a sus clientes un buen servicio en su tienda. Lucero quedó viuda hace un tiempo debido al fallecimiento de su esposo y por tanto ahora vive con su madre y una hermana. Lucero al ver que tenía que generar sus propios ingresos, montó una tienda general en donde ofrece todos los productos de la canasta familiar, y esta tienda es muy reconocida en su sector gracias al buen servicio que ofrece Lucero. Gracias a que sus ventas han sido buenas, Lucero poco a poco ha ido incrementando el surtido de mercancía que ofrece en su tienda. Actualmente, Lucero quiere aumentar el surtido de productos que ofrece en su tienda, pues sus clientes preguntan por algunos productos que ella no los tiene. Es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar con los cuales pueda aumentar el surtido de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Lucero espera que su tienda siga aumentando las ventas y pueda ofrecerles a su madre y su hermana una mejor calidad de vida. Además, sueña con poder ofrecer empleo para personas que requieran de unos ingresos y no tengan oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Lucero is a person who is noted for being very hard-working and always wanting to provide her customers with a good service in her store.  She has been widowed for some time and now lives with her mother and a sister.  Lucero saw that she needed to make her own income and so she set up a general store where she sells basic household products.  The store is very well known in her area thanks to the good service that she provides.  Thanks to this, her sales have been good.  Lucero has gradually increased the range of merchandise that she offers in her store.  She would currently like to increase the range of goods that she offers even further as her customers are asking for certain products that she does not have.  For this reason, she is looking for a loan which will enable her to buy basic household products so that she can increase her range of products.

Lucero hopes that her sales will continue to increase and that she will be able to offer her mother and her sister a better quality of life.  She also dreams of being able to create jobs for people who need income but don't have any work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy basic household products so that she can increase her stock

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucila es una persona que se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma y siempre querer brindarle a su familia mejores oportunidades de vida. Lucila se encuentra casada y es madre de 2 hijas, una de ellas sufre de síndrome de Down, por lo que requiere todo el tiempo la atención de su madre. Debido a que el empleo de su esposo no genera los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar, Lucila decidió montar un negocio desde hace un tiempo de venta de productos de uso personal por catálogo y gracias a esto subsana los gastos que hacen falta por cubrir en su hogar. Lucila no puede atender a sus clientes un mayor tiempo del que les puede ofrecer ahora ya que requiere el cuidado de sus dos hijas, por lo que su negocio a pesar de tener muy buenos pedidos no ha podido seguir creciendo en ventas desde hace un tiempo. Sin embargo, Lucila tiene algunos clientes que no requieren de mucho tiempo de atención y estos le hacen muy buenos pedidos de grandes cantidades, y gracias a esto su negocio puede seguir funcionando. Con el ánimo de hacer entrega de un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente, Lucila requiere comprar a sus proveedores los productos del pedido, sin embargo, en la actualidad no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras, por lo que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal para atender un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Lucila espera tener su negocio funcionando durante mucho tiempo, puesto que este le genera ingresos para su hogar y además le permite estar pendiente del cuidado de sus 2 hijas. Lucila sueña con que su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y con que sus 2 hijas puedan ingresar a una educación de calidad y puedan tener una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Lucila is a person who has characterized herself for having great charisma and always wanting to provide the best opportunities in life for her family.  Lucila is married and the mother of 2 daughters, one of whom has Down’s syndrome and requires her mother’s attention all the time.  Because her husband’s work doesn’t generate sufficient income to support the household, Lucila decided to start a business some time ago selling personal products by catalog.  Thanks to this activity, she is able to make up for the expenses that are not covered for the home.  Lucila cannot tend to her customers for more time than she currently offers them because she must take care of her daughters.  For this reason, she has not been able to grow her business, despite the fact that she has a good amount of orders.  Regardless, Lucila has some customers that do not require a lot of time and attention, and these placed good orders with her in large quantities.  Thanks to this, the business can continue to function.  With the intention to make delivery of a large order that a client has placed, Lucila needs to buy the requested products from her suppliers.  However, she currently does not have enough capital to make these purchases.  She has the hope that a loan will afford her the opportunity to obtain the purchase of these personal products, to meet the large order that her customer has made.

Lucila hopes to have her business functioning for a long time, as it generates income for her household and allows her to care for her 2 daughters.  Lucila dreams that her family could enjoy a higher standard of living, and that her 2 daughters can be admitted to a quality education and be stable financially.

loans.use: to buy personal products to fill a large order one of her customers has made.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 28 years old and married to Reylan. The couple was blessed with seven children, four of whom are studying.

Rose has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, soft drinks and beverages. She has had this business for more than 10 years and it provides a good impact on their lives.  

She is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy stocks of groceries to offer in her store.  She hopes to improve her usual income every day through this loan.

loans.use: to buy stocks of groceries to offer in her store

loans.name: Olga Lucia

texts.es:
Olga es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo las ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superarlas y continuar progresando en vida. Olga es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de una hija de 15 años, a quien su padre nunca quiso reconocer, por lo que a Olga le tocó buscarse por sus propios medios los ingresos necesarios para el sustento para su hija. Olga aprendió empíricamente la actividad de la venta de mercancía especialmente prendas de vestir, y gracias a esto ha podido generar los ingresos para su hogar y garantizarle a su hija las necesidades básicas. Gracias a su buen servicio, ha captado muchos clientes de su municipio, y esto ha hecho que sus ventas sean muy buenas y cada vez vayan creciendo más. Debido a que un cliente le ha hecho un gran pedido, y Olga no cuenta con el capital suficiente para hacer la compra a sus proveedores, Olga tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir con el ánimo de responder a un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Olga espera que sus ventas sigan aumentando y que su negocio le pueda generar grandes ingresos. Además, sueña con tener un gran almacén en el que pueda ofrecer gran cantidad de mercancía. Olga sueña que su hija pueda culminar sus estudios básicos y tenga la posibilidad de acceder a una educación universitaria que le permita prepararse para un empleo que sea bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Olga is a person who has had to deal with many hardships in her life.  However, her desire to do well has enabled her to overcome them and continue making progress.  Olga is a single mother.  She has a 15-year-old daughter whose father never wanted to acknowledge her.  This meant that Olga had to find a way of making the income she needed to support her daughter.  She learned how to sell merchandise, especially clothing, by actually doing it.  Thanks to this, she has been able to make income for her household and provide for her daughter's basic needs.  Thanks to her good service, she has gained a lot of customers in her town.  This means that her sales have been very good and they continue to grow.  Owing to the fact that a customer has made a large order with her and she doesn't have enough capital to make the necessary purchase from her suppliers, Olga hopes to receive a loan which will enable her to buy the garments she needs so that she can respond to this order.

Olga hopes that her sales will continue to increase and that her business will make her a lot of income.  She dreams of having a large store where she can sell a large amount of merchandise.  Olga dreams of her daughter finishing her basic education and having the possibility to attend a university so that she can train for a well-paid job.

loans.use: to buy clothing so that she can respond to a large order from a customer

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer salir adelante. Desde muy joven aprendió la actividad de la agricultura gracias a su padre, y desde entonces colaboraba con él en el cultivo de verduras. Sus padres han fallecido y le dejaron como herencia el terreno donde cultivaban, por lo que Alberto ahora hace de sus cosechas su fuente de ingresos. Alberto cultiva legumbres, en especial fríjoles, y tiene grandes clientes que le compran a muy buen precio sus productos. Alberto quiere aumentar la variedad de productos que cultiva, por lo que quiere comprar semillas y abonos para empezar a cultivar nuevas legumbres. Debido a que en el momento no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras, Alberto espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de semillas y abonos para sembrar en sus cultivos nuevas legumbres.

Alberto espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues ofrecerá más productos a sus clientes. Alberto sueña con tener una gran parcela de cultivos donde tenga grandes cosechas y sea reconocido por la calidad de sus productos. Alberto sueña con que cuando su negocio crezca, pueda ofrecer empleo para las personas más necesitadas que no han tenido oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Alberto is noted for being very hard-working and always wanting to make progress in life.  He learned how to farm from his father at a very young age and worked together with his father growing vegetables.  Alberto's parents have now passed away and, as an inheritance, they left him the land which they used to grow crops on.  As a result, Alberto's harvests are now his source of income.  Alberto grows vegetables, especially beans, and has big customers who buy his products from him at a very good price.  Alberto would like to increase the variety of crops that he grows and would like to buy seeds and fertilizers so that he can start growing new vegetables.  Right now, he does not have enough capital to make these purchases and so he hopes to receive a loan which will enable him to buy seeds and fertilizers to grow his new vegetables.

Alberto hopes that his income will increase significantly as he will be able to offer his customers more products.  He dreams of having a large plot of crops which will provide him with large harvests.  He would also like to become well known for the quality of his crops.  Alberto dreams that, when his business grows, he will be able to provide work to the most needy people who do not have any work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers to grow new vegetables

loans.name: Glory

texts.en:
Glory is 56 years old, a hard-working mother and wife. She has had three children. She has a retail shop that serves as the source of income for her family. 

Glory is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy goods to stock in her store, such as biscuits, snack foods and vinegar. These will improve her sales and help her acquire more customers, which will allow her to create a better prospect for her business.

loans.use: to buy goods to stock in her store such as biscuits, snack foods and vinegar

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina siempre ha querido brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Es por esto que debido a que su esposo no genera ingresos suficientes para garantizarles una buena calidad de vida Luz Marina decidió montar su negocio de venta de productos de uso personal por catálogo. Luz Marina se encuentra casada y es madre de 1 hijo de 5 años, al cual quiere brindarle la mejor educación posible desde temprana edad. Luz Marina tiene en su negocio una muy buena alternativa de generación de ingresos, gracias que a la vez que lo atiende puede estar pendiente del cuidado de su hijo. Luz Marina aprendió esta actividad de una amiga que realizaba esto desde hacía un tiempo, y esta la invitaba para que asistiera a las reuniones de promoción de los productos. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece Luz Marina, su negocio ha visto como sus ventas se incrementan considerablemente, y gracias a esto ha podido generar buenos ingresos para ir mejorando poco a poco la calidad de vida de su familia. Con el ánimo de entregar un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente suyo, Luz Marina debe comprar los productos a su proveedor, sin embargo, en la actualidad no cuenta con el capital suficiente para ello. Es por esto que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal para atender un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Luz Marina espera poder seguir atendiendo su negocio y que este le siga generando los ingresos para que su hogar pueda progresar poco a poco. Luz Marina sueña con que su esposo pueda tener una mejor condición de vida y con que su hijo sea un gran profesional estudiado y reconocido por su calidad humana.
texts.en:
Luz Marina has always wanted to provide a better standard of living for her family.  For this reason, because her husband does not generate sufficient income to guarantee a good quality of life, Luz Marina decided to start a business selling personal products by catalog.  Luz Marina is married and the mother of 1 son who is 5 years old, for whom she wants to provide the best education possible starting at an early age.  Luz Marina has, by means of her business, a very good alternate mode of generating income thanks to the fact that she can concurrently care for her son.  Luz Marina learned this activity from a friend who had carried out this type of work for a long time and invited her to attend product promotional meetings.  Thanks to the excellent attention Luz Marina offers, her business has seen sales increase considerably.  She has been able to generate a good income and, little by little, improve her family’s standard of living.  With the desire to deliver a large order from a client of hers, Luz Marina must purchase the necessary products from her provider.  However, she currently does not have sufficient capital to do this.  For this reason, she has the hope that a loan will afford her the possibility to buy the personal products so that she can fill the large order that her customer has placed.

Luz Marina hopes to continue tending to her business, and that it continues to generate income for the home so she can slowly get ahead.  Luz Marina dreams that her husband could have a better life, and that her son grows up to be a learned professional and known as a quality human being.

loans.use: to buy personal products to fill an order that a customer has placed.

loans.name: Maria Zoraida

texts.es:
Trabajadora es la mejor palabra con la que se pueda reconocer a Maria Zoraida, esta persona casada y madre de 3 hijos a los que siempre les ha querido brindar todo lo necesario. Maria Zoraida aprendió la actividad de la fabricación de arepas desde hace aproximadamente 5 años, pues trabajó para una fábrica de arepas de su municipio. Hace por lo menos 5 meses decidió independizarse y montó su propia fábrica de arepas, que ha ido construyendo poco a poco a medida que el capital disponible se lo permite. Maria Zoraida actualmente vende sus arepas a algunas tiendas y familias de su municipio, y gracias a esto genera ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar junto con su esposo. La manera en que Maria Zoraida fabrica sus arepas es todavía muy artesanal, pues no cuenta ni con la maquinaria ni con las herramientas adecuadas para fabricar industrialmente sus arepas. Esto hace que no pueda producir en grandes cantidades y aún tenga que vender pocas cantidades de su producto. Gracias a que sus arepas son muy apetecidas por sus clientes, quienes le han hecho grandes pedidos que no ha podido satisfacer por la poca capacidad de producción que tiene, Maria Zoraida ha tenido la motivación de comprar algunas máquinas y herramientas industriales para la producción de sus arepas además de la adecuación de su sitio de trabajo. Es por esto que Maria Zoraida aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de maquinaria para la fabricación de sus arepas, además de la adecuación de su sitio de trabajo, para poder así producir su producto en grandes cantidades y poder responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.

Maria Zoraida espera que su negocio crezca y pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas, además de que su familia pueda gozar de los beneficios económicos que le puede traer este. Maria Zoraida sueña con que sus 3 hijos puedan tener una educación de calidad y en un futuro tener una vida económica estable.
texts.en:
'Hardworker' is the best word to describe Maria Zoraida. She is married and the mother of 3 children, to whom she has always wanted to give what they need. Maria Zoraida has been learning this activity of making arepas since she was 5 years old, because she worked for an arepas factory in her town. At least 5 months ago, she decided to go off on her own and she opened her own arepa factory, that she has been building little by little, as capital availability has permitted. Maria Zoraida now sells her arepas to stores and families in her town. Thanks to this, she generates income to support her home with her husband. The way that Maria Zoraida makes her arepas is still very artisanal, because she doesn't have the machinery or the tools to produce her arepas industrially. This causes her to not be able to produce great quantities and she still has to sell her product in small quantities. Thanks to her arepas being much in demand by her customers, who have made orders she can't fill due to low production capacity, Maria Zoraida is motivated to buy some industrial machinery and tools for arepa production, as well as outfitting her workplace. That is why Maria Zoraida aspires to having the loan give her the possibility to access the purchase of machinery for making arepas and outfitting her workplace, in order to be able to make her product in large quantities and be able to respond to her customers' orders.  

Maria Zoraida hopes that her business will grow and be able to generate employment for people who need it the most, and that her family will be able to enjoy the financial benefits that this can bring her. Maria Zoraida dreams of her 3 children being able to have a quality education and in the future have a financially stable life.

loans.use: to buy machinery to make her arepas, as well as outfitting her workplace, in order to make her product in large quantities to fill her customers' orders.

loans.name: Elman

texts.es:
Elman es una persona que siempre ha buscado mejores oportunidades de progreso y una buena calidad de vida. Es por esto que desde hace aproximadamente 3 años decidió abandonar la ciudad de Ibagué, Colombia, y ubicarse en el municipio de la Ceja, al oriente del departamento de Antioquia. Desde allí ejerce la actividad de elaboración de muebles en artesanías, la cual aprendió desde hace unos 25 años. Elman es reconocido en esta región gracias a la buena calidad y belleza de sus productos, por lo que tiene grandes clientes los cuales le hacen grandes pedidos. Debido a que un cliente le ha hecho un gran pedido, Elman requiere comprar la materia prima para la fabricación del mismo, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras a su proveedor, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brindará la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas para la elaboración de sus muebles en artesanía.

Elman sueña con que su negocio siga creciendo y con encontrar la posibilidad de generar empleo para las personas que más lo necesitan. Además, sueña con tener una mejor calidad de vida, con poder disfrutar de una mejor capacidad económica y con brindarle a su familia mayores alternativas de progreso.
texts.en:
Elman is a person who has always sought better opportunities for making progress and a good quality of life.  Three years ago, he left the city of Ibagué, Colombia and started living in the town of La Ceja, to the east of Antioquia department.  He works there making artisan furniture, a business he learned 25 years ago.  Elman is well known in this region thanks to the good quality and beauty of his products.  He has big customers who place large orders with him.,  One of Elman's customers has placed a large order and he needs to buy raw materials so that he can fill it.  However, he doesn't have enough money to make the necessary purchases from his supplier.  For this reason, he hopes to receive a loan that will enable him to buy the raw materials he needs to make his furniture.

Elman dreams of his business continuing to grow and of the possibility of creating work for people who need it most.  He also dreams of enjoying a better quality of life, being in a better financial situation and providing his family with more alternatives for making progress.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making his artisan furniture

loans.name: Eugenia De Jesus

texts.es:
Eugenia es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar muchas dificultades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superar las adversidades y seguir adelante con su familia. Hace unos 7 años su esposo murió, y ella quedó como una madre soltera cabeza de familia a cargo de 5 hijos de los cuales la mayoría aún requieren de la atención de su madre. Eugenia al ver que debía generar los ingresos para su hogar, comenzó a ofrecer el servicio de la confección a terceros, actividad que había aprendido mucho tiempo atrás y realizaba esporádicamente. Gracias a la buena calidad de los productos de Eugenia, sus trabajos se convirtieron en un referente en su región, y ahora tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes. En la actualidad tiene un gran pedido para elaborar uniformes ya que se avecina la temporada escolar, por lo que busca comprar la materia prima como la tela y los hilos para poderla confeccionar. Debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar toda la materia prima que requiere, Eugenia aspira a que un préstamo le brindará la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas como tela e hilos para la confección de uniformes que le ha pedido un cliente.

Eugenia sueña con que su taller siga creciendo y pueda generar empleo en un futuro para las madres solteras en igual condición que ella. Además, aspira a que sus hijos puedan ser grandes profesionales con un gran empleo, que les permita salir adelante y construir grandes familias.
texts.en:
Eugenia is a person who has had to deal with many difficulties in life.  However, her desire to do well has allowed her to overcome her difficulties and make progress together with her family.  Seven years ago Eugenia's husband died and she was left as a single mother responsible for 5 children, most of whom still needed their mother's care.  Seeing that she needed to make income for her household, Eugenia started offering a dressmaking service to third parties.  She learned this trade a long time ago and used to work in it periodically.  Thanks to the good quality of her products, Eugenia's work became the standard in her region and now she has very good orders from her customers.  She currently has a large order to make uniforms as the beginning of the school year is approaching.  For this reason, she is looking to buy the raw materials she needs such as fabric and threads.  As she doesn't have enough capital to buy all the materials she needs, Eugenia hopes to receive a loan which will enable her to buy fabric and threads for making the uniforms that her customer has ordered.

Eugenia dreams of her workshop continuing to grow and being able to provide work in the future to single mothers who find themselves in the same situation as her.  She also dreams of her children becoming professionals with good jobs that will allow them to get ahead in life and form their own families.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as fabric and threads for making uniforms that a customer has ordered

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es:
Jesus Antonio es una persona ampliamente reconocida en su municipio gracias a que es una persona muy carismática y muy trabajadora. Es padre de 2 hijos a los cuales su madre abandonó hace un tiempo, y a los cuales Jesus Antonio les quiere brindar todo lo necesario. Jesus Antonio se dedica a la reparación de electrodomésticos, actividad que aprendió desde temprana edad y con la cual genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Gracias a la buena calidad de los servicios que ofrece Jesus Antonio, su taller es ampliamente reconocido en su municipio, y esto le ha llevado a tener muy buena clientela y siempre satisfecha. Con el ánimo de tener los repuestos necesarios que solicitan sus clientes para la reparación de los electrodomésticos, Jesus Antonio busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de repuestos para equipos electrodomésticos para reparar los pedidos de sus clientes.

Jesus Antonio tiene el sueño de poderle brindar a su familia un mejor futuro, con una mejor estabilidad económica, que le permita a sus 2 hijos evitar pasar por tantas adversidades como lo ha hecho el. Además, sueña con generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y que nunca tuvieron oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Jesus Antonio is very well-known in his town as a hard-working and charismatic person. He is the father of two children who were abandoned by their mother many years ago. Jose Antonio wants to be able to provide everything necessary for them. He works repairing household appliances, which he learned to do when he was very young and which provides enough income to maintain his household. 

Thanks to the quality of service he provides, his repair shop is well known around town and he has a very satisfied clientele. In order to have the spare parts necessary to repair his clients' appliances, Jesus Antonio is requesting a loan that will allow him to purchase them. 

Jesus Antonio's dream is to provide his family with a better future, a more stable economic situation and to keep his 2 children from facing as many challenges as he has. He would also love to provide jobs for the neediest people, those who have never had any work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy spare parts in order to repair his customers' appliances.

loans.name: Adriana Maria

texts.es:
Adriana se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al trabajo, pues desde muy temprana edad debía garantizarse su propio sustento. Posteriormente se casó y ahora es madre de 1 hijo, y cuando su esposo murió debía garantizarle todo lo requería su hijo. Adriana gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de trabajar ha podido salir adelante y superar las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida, es por esto que ahora su hijo puede acceder a una educación, y cada vez le puede ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. Adriana tiene una tienda general en la cual ofrece a sus clientes todos los productos de la canasta familiar. Debido a que el refrigerador donde guarda los productos que requieren de refrigeración es muy pequeño, Adriana no puede garantizarle a sus clientes la ventas de más productos refrigerados, pero con el ánimo de cambiar esta situación Adriana espera que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de un refrigerador más grande que le permita ofrecer mayor cantidad a sus clientes de productos que requieran de refrigeración.

Adriana espera que de esta manera sus ventas aumenten considerablemente, pues sus clientes preguntan mucho por estos productos que no puede vender por el refrigerador pequeño. Además, Adriana sueña con que su hijo pueda acceder a una educación de buena calidad y que ella y su hijo puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Adriana tiene el gran sueño de montar un supermercado donde pueda emplear a mujeres que sean madres de familia y así aportar a mejorarles la calidad de vida a otras personas que necesiten de un apoyo.
texts.en:
Adriana has dedicated a large part of her life to work, given that she had to support herself from a young age.  She was married previously, and now is the mother of 1 son.  When her husband died, she alone had to provide everything that her son needed.  Thanks to her effort and her desire to work, she has been able to overcome the challenges life has presented her.  It’s for these reasons that her son can now have access to an education, and she can offer him a better standard of living each day.  Adriana has a general store where she sells all types of products for the home to customers.  Because the refrigerator where she stores perishables is very small, Adriana can’t guarantee them access to more refrigerated items.  However, with the desire to change this situation, Adriana hopes that a loan will afford her access to buying a larger refrigerator so she can offer a greater quantity of perishable products.

Adriana hopes that this move will augment her sales considerably, as her customers often ask her for these types of products, which she can’t sell because her current refrigerator is too small.  Adriana dreams of providing a quality education for her son and that he can enjoy a better life.  Adriana has the great dream of opening a supermarket where she could employ other women who are mothers and, in this way, provide a better life for other people who are in need of some help.

loans.use: to buy a larger refrigerator, which would allow her to offer customers a greater quantity of perishable products.

loans.name: Dahiana Andrea

texts.es:
Dahiana es una joven emprendedora que siempre ha querido salir adelante y aportar a sus padres ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Dahiana se dedica a la actividad de la confección, y gracias a esto ha podido salir adelante y progresado económicamente. Dahiana aprendió la actividad gracias a que es de trascendencia familiar, pues su madre y una tía han desempeñado esta actividad durante toda la vida. Dahiana ha empezado poco a poco a ir incluyendo en sus confecciones, su propia línea de prendas de vestir, pues ha encontrado muy buenos clientes a los que les puede comercializar su propia línea de ropa. Dahiana ha encontrado grandes inconvenientes con la fabricación de su propia línea de prendas de vestir, sin embargo, ha encontrado con su esfuerzo el camino para seguir adelante. Actualmente Dahiana quiere ofrecer productos nuevos en su línea de prendas de vestir, por lo que quiere comprar una máquina estampadora. Sin embargo, Dahiana no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder realizar esta compra, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina estampadora para su taller de confección.

Dahiana sueña con tener una línea propia de prendas de vestir en la que se vea reflejado todo su esfuerzo y empeño por salir adelante. Además, sueña con que sus padres puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y de mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Dahiana espera poder generar mucho empleo para personas muy necesitadas que no encuentran oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Dahiana is a young entrepreneur who has always wanted to get ahead and to provide an income that will help sustain her household. Dahiana is a seamstress and thanks to her work she has been able to get ahead economically. She learned her work from her family, because her mother and her aunt have also been seamstresses their entire lives. 

Dahiana has been adding her own creations to her work little by little and has built a good clientele to whom she can market her own line of clothing. Dahiana has faced some big challenges in creating her own line of clothing but has discovered the inner resources to keep moving forward. 

Now Dahiana wants to offer new products in her clothing line which is why she wants to buy a printing machine. Unfortunately she does no have enough capital to make this purchase, which is why she is requesting a loan. 

Dahiana dreams of having a line of clothing that reflects her efforts and her drive to succeed. She would also love to see her parents have a better quality of life and more economic opportunities. Dahian hopes to create jobs for people in need and without other work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a printing machine for her sewing workshop.

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es:
Carlos es una persona reconocida por ser muy trabajadora y tener un gran carisma. Carlos desde muy joven aprendió la actividad de la agricultura, pues su padre se dedicó gran parte de su vida a esta actividad. Desde el fallecimiento de su padre, Carlos heredó su trabajo y ahora es el que saca su cultivo adelante y con el que genera los ingresos necesarios para su sustento. Debido al mal clima que se ha tenido durante los últimos meses, sus cultivos se han visto muy afectados y esto se refleja en el poco crecimiento de sus siembras, es por esto que Carlos busca un préstamo que le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas para sacar adelante su cultivo.

Carlos espera que de esta manera su cultivo pueda seguir creciendo y pueda generar los productos de buena calidad. Carlos sueña con tener un gran cultivo y con poder generar empleo para las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Carlos is a person who is known for being hardworking and having a lot of charisma. Since he was very young, Carlos learned about agriculture, since his father spent a large part of his life in this activity. When his father passed away, Carlos inherited his job and now it is him who gets the crop ahead and who generates the necessary income for support. Due to the bad weather in the last few months, his crops have been very affected and this is reflected in the lack of growth in his plantings. That is why Carlos is seeking a loan that will afford him the opportunity to access the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and fungicides in order to get his crops ahead. 

Carlos hopes that this way his crop can keep growing and he can generates products of good quality. Carlos dreams of having a good crop and being able to generate employment for the people who need it the most.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides and fungicides to get his crop ahead.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos, pues el padre de sus hijos falleció hace un tiempo y ella quedó encargada de los ingresos de su hogar. Sandra, gracias a que tiene la cualidad de ser muy trabajadora ha podido generar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. Sandra recibió del fallecimiento de su esposo el vehículo de transporte escolar que este manejaba, por lo que ella siguió operando este vehículo durante un tiempo para generar los ingresos para su hogar. Debido a problemas de salud, Sandra tuvo que dejar de manejar el vehículo y consiguió quién se lo trabajara, pero como ahora ya no recibía los mismos ingresos del vehículo de transporte, pues debía pagar el salario de quien lo manejaba, Sandra tuvo que conseguir un segundo empleo para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar. Sandra, como todavía es la encargada del mantenimiento del vehículo de transporte, debe garantizar el óptimo funcionamiento del mismo; es por esto que ahora que se encuentra averiado busca un préstamo que le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la reparación del motor del vehículo de transporte escolar con el cual genera sus ingresos.

Sandra espera que de esta manera pueda seguir generando los ingresos que provienen de este vehículo y pueda seguir ofreciéndoles a sus 2 hijos una buena calidad de vida. Sandra sueña con que sus hijos tengan una buena estabilidad económica y con que puedan acceder a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Sandra is a single mother and head of household for 2 children; the father of her sons died some time ago, leaving her solely in charge of generating income for the home.  Thanks to the fact that she is a hard worker, Sandra has been able to generate enough money to support her children.  Upon her husband’s death, Sandra inherited the school vehicle that he drove.  She continued driving this vehicle in order to generate revenue for the family.  Because of health problems, Sandra had to stop driving and hire someone else to do it instead.  This, however, did not generate the same level of income because she had to pay the person a salary.  Sandra had to find a second job in order to support herself and her children.  Because Sandra is still charged with maintaining the vehicle, she must guarantee that it is working properly.  For this reason, she finds herself seeking a loan that will afford her the opportunity to make repairs to the motor for the school vehicle that generates her income.

Sandra hopes to, in this manner, continue receiving the income generated by this vehicle and continue offering her 2 children a good quality of life.  Sandra dreams of providing financial stability for her kids and giving them access to a quality education.

loans.use: to repair the engine of her school transportation vehicle which generates her income.

loans.name: Sandra Maritza

texts.es:
La señora Sandra tiene 35 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 6 y 4 años de edad. Ella tiene ocho meses de dedicarse a la venta de calzado, venta de lácteos y destazo de animales para vender la carne. El negocio de calzado y los lácteos los tiene en casa de sus papas ya que la vivienda esta ubicada en el centro de la ciudad. El negocio del destazo lo hace en su vivienda y es una herencia familiar.

La prioridad en este momento, es surtir su venta de calzado, comprar estantes para que sea más atractivo para los clientes y por eso solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo. El calzado se lo traen de Nicaragua a través de pedidos. Con el préstamo ella desea superarse como comerciante y tener dinero para cancelar el préstamo, brindarles la educación a sus hijos ya que ellos van creciendo y ahorrar para un mejor futuro. Ella desea continuar mejorando su negocio de calzado, comprando otros accesorios para vender más.
texts.en:
Sandra is 35 years old, married and she lives with her husband and two children, aged 4 and 6. She has been selling shoes, as well as dairy products and meat, for 8 months. She operates her dairy and shoe business in her parents' home because it is closer to the center of the city. She operates the meat and butchering business out of her own home, which is a family inheritance. 
 
Her priority right now is to stock up on shoes and to buy shelves in order to make her business more attractive to her customers. That is why she is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo. She orders the shoes from Nicaragua. With the loan she would like to become a better businesswoman and earn enough to pay back her loan, provide an education for her children who are getting bigger everyday, and save a little for the future. She wants to keep improving her shoe store and eventually buy other accessories as well in order to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy more shelves and stock for her shoe business.

loans.name: Roberto Arturo

texts.es:
Roberto es una persona reconocida en su municipio por su carisma y sus ganas de trabajar. Roberto es un hombre casado y padre de 3 hijos a los cuales siempre ha educado con el mejor ejemplo y siempre queriendo brindarles la mejor calidad de vida. Roberto se dedica al corte de césped en los jardines de su municipio, y tiene muy buenos clientes gracias a la calidad de su trabajo. Debido al uso de su guadañadora, Roberto tiene su herramienta de trabajo muy desgastada, es por esto que ahora quiere renovarla pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizarlo. Es por esto que Roberto acude a un préstamo con la esperanza de que le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una guadañadora para ejercer su actividad con una mejor herramienta de trabajo.

Roberto sueña con que su trabajo le genere ingresos con los cuales su esposa y sus 3 hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Además sueña con que su empleo crezca, se pueda convertir en una gran empresa de contratos y pueda emplear a muchas personas que requieran de unos ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Roberto is well-known in his community for his charisma and his dedication to his work. He is married and has three children, who he has always tried to provide with the best quality of life possible. Roberto works cutting lawns in his community and he has a very good clientele thanks to the quality of his work. Because he uses his mower so much, it is really worn down. Roberto would like to buy a new one but he doesn't have enough money to do so. That is why he is requesting a loan: in order to buy a new mower and to be able to do his job better. 

Roberto's dream is that his work would provide enough income to provide him, his wife and three children with a better quality of life. He would also love to grow his business, win some new contracts and be able to employ people who need some additional income.

loans.use: to buy a new lawnmower in order to do his job better.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
Alejandra es una joven madre cabeza de familia de un hijo de 3 años, emprendedora y siempre dispuesta a salir adelante. Gracias a que el padre de su hijo la abandonó tuvo que garantizar el sustento para su hijo, por esto empezó a buscar alternativas de negocio y encontró en la venta de comidas una muy buena oportunidad. Alejandra vende platos de comidas a los habitantes de su región, quienes tienen sus platos como referencia por la buena calidad de los mismos. Gracias a esta actividad, Alejandra genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hijo y con esto se puede brindar una buena calidad de vida. Debido a que no posee una nevera o un congelador donde pueda guardar sus comidas que requieran de refrigeración, Alejandra solo puede vender lo que pueda preparar en un día, pues no puede preparar sus comidas con anterioridad ya que se dañan sin tener refrigeración. Debido a esto Alejandra ha tenido que rechazar algunos pedidos de sus clientes y tener que seguir vendiendo poco a poco sus platos de comidas para que no se dañen. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Alejandra aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un refrigerador que le permita guardar allí sus comidas preparadas y que no se dañen hasta el momento de su entrega.

Alejandra espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues tendrá la oportunidad de atender a clientes que antes debía rechazar. Alejandra sueña con tener una gran casa de banquetes o con tener un gran restaurante. Además sueña con que su hijo pueda tener una estabilidad económica y con que en un futuro pueda acceder a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Alejandra is a young mother of one son who is 3 years old, entrepreneurial and always disposed to getting ahead.  Because the father of her son abandoned her, she has to guarantee sustenance for her son alone.  She started looking for business alternatives, and found a good opportunity in food sales.  Alejandra sells plates of food to the residents of her region, who have her cooking as reference for its excellent quality.  Thanks to this activity, Alejandra generates the necessary income to support her son and, with it, can provide a good standard of living.  Because she doesn’t have a refrigerator or freezer for storing perishable foods, she can only sell what she prepares in one day, as she can’t make her food earlier since it will spoil without refrigeration.  Because of this, Alejandra has had to turn down some orders from customers and sell her food little by little so it doesn’t go bad.  With the desire to improve this situation, Alejandra hopes that a loan will allow her to buy a refrigerator where she can preserve her prepared food until it’s served.

Alejandra hopes that this will allow her to augment her income considerably, since she’ll be able to tend to customers that she may have previously had to turn down.  Alejandra dreams of having a large banquet house or restaurant.  Her dreams include her son having financial stability and a good quality education in the future.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator that will allow her to preserve her prepared food until it's served.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maria del Carmen es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. Con 38 años de edad, se encuentra casada y es madre de 1 hijo al que siempre le ha querido brindar lo mejor posible. Maria del Carmen se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal como lociones, shampoo, cremas, desodorantes, esmaltes, entre otros y gracias a esto le colabora a su esposo en la generación de ingresos para su hogar. Tiene muy buenos clientes, principalmente por el buen servicio que ofrece a sus clientes, y gracias a esto sus ventas han ido aumentando en los últimos meses. Debido a que tiene grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, que en el momento no ha podido satisfacer por la falta de capital para hacer la compra de los productos a su proveedor, Maria del Carmen busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal para atender los grandes pedidos de sus clientes.

Maria del Carmen espera que su negocio siga creciendo para poder seguir contribuyendo a los ingresos de su hogar y permitir así que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Además, sueña con que su negocio crezca y poder montar un almacén donde ofrezca una gran variedad de productos y donde pueda emplear a personas que requieran de un ingreso para su familia y no han tenido oportunidades laborales. Maria del Carmen sueña con que su hijo pueda acceder a una educación de mayor calidad y en un futuro ingresar a una educación universitaria que le permita prepararse para un empleo bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Maria del Carmen is someone who has always been hard-working and dedicated to her family. She is 38 years old, married and has one child, who she has always wanted to provide for the best she can. Maria del Carmen sells personal use products like lotions, shampoo, creams, deodorants, nail polish and more. Thanks to this work she is able to contribute to the household income. She has really good customers, mainly because of the great service she offers them. As a result, her sales have been increasing over the past few months. Due to the increasing demand, which she hasn't been able to meet because she doesn't have the capital to purchase products from her supplier, Maria del Carmen is asking for a loan. The capital would allow her to buy more personal use products in order to meet the growing demands of her customers.

Maria del Carmen hopes her business will continue to grow and that she can continue contributing to the household income so her family can have a better quality of life. She also hopes to be able to open a store one day where she will sell a wide variety of products and where she could employ people who also need to make money to support their families. Maria del Carmen would love for her son to get a better education and to go to college one day, which would help him get a well-paid job in the future.

loans.use: to buy more personal use products and fulfill large orders from her customers.

loans.name: Jeanalyn

texts.en:
At 41 years old, Jeanalyn is still single. She focused on improving their poor living, that’s why she never bothers to get married. She is requesting a loan of 12,000 pesos to buy snacks and beverages to stock her store. She invests in it regularly because by better rotating stock she earns higher profits. 

This is precious to her because it would generate higher working capital and she could acquire a good variety of stock to offer.

loans.use: to buy snacks and beverages to stock her store

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
Bella is a business-minded woman who has been supporting her family with her sari-sari (variety) store. She is 41 years of age and blessed with five children. 


Bella is asking for a loan amount of P8,000 to be able to have a variety of products to offer. She would buy more variety of biscuits, candies, sweets, juice and soft drinks that are usually ordered by her customers. It would attract more buyers and provide a good income for her to have a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more variety of biscuits, candies, sweets, juice and soft drinks

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio is 27 years old, single and lives with his parents at Cataggaman. He did not finished his college education, so he decided to work and earn income so that he would not be a burden for the family. He patiently provides motorcycle transport services to the people in their village. He provides the services daily from 6 am up to 6 pm. 

He is now asking for a loan of P7,000 to buy tires and spare parts to use on his motorcycle and ensures the safety of passengers and his life as well.  He hopes that someday, he can strengthen the business and keep earning good income from it. He is also dreaming of having his own family someday.

loans.use: to buy tires and spare parts to use on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is helping her husband in managing their rice farming business. They helping each other, sharing ideas to get a better quality of crop that will sell at a high price. They are doing this just for the future of their children.

Thelma is 37 years of age and blessed with three children. She and her husband started farming business when they got married. Now, they have been 20 years in farming and still continue managing their farm because it is their primary source of income of the family.

Thelma wants to borrow a loan of P25,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and herbicides to use in farming. She wishes to develop her skills in managing their farm to maintain the business and continue earning profits from the business.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and herbicides to use in farming.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
Noemi is a hard-working woman who sells fish and meat. She has been doing this for three years and it has contributed to a better standard of living.


She likes to drive and call out her products to sell. This is her simple strategy to sell and the same time earn high income. She is happily married to a loving farmer, a friendly and hard-working man who helps her in improving their lives.


She is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy fish and meat to sell and for the maintenance of her motorcycle. Her growing business is one of the most important things for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy fish and meat to sell and also maintain her motorcycle

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel manages a sari-sari (variety) store in their village where she is able to generate a monthly income of P5,000 which is used for daily allowances of children and daily needs of the family. She has been in this kind of business for almost 10 years. Maricel is 34 years old, married, and has three children. Two of them go to school while the other one is still an infant.

Maricel is aiming to increase the volume of her merchandise but her capital is not enough due to their household expenses and daily allowances of her children. For her to realize her goal, she is asking for a loan of P5,000. She hopes that she can obtain the loan amount requested. She believes that despite the situation she has gone through, someday she can attain success for her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her variety store

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia lives in her own house with her family (her husband and four children). She is a very hardworking and responsible mother. She has worked for 12 years selling fruits, vegetables and meat to help her family get ahead in life. She is in need of a lot of effort and patience in carrying her goods to sell every day.


Sonia does it every day because of her affection for her family. Right now, she is asking for a loan of 5,000 pesos to buy additional vegetables to sell. She hopes to gain more income through this amount and in this way, she can be able to save for her service.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Adora

texts.en:
